meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of meat or seafood served on French bread.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a poboy for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: The poboy at the restaurant was delicious.
meanings.sent3: The poboy looked so big, I wondered if I could finish it all.
meanings.sent4: The poboy was a tower of flavors on a crispy baguette.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the poboy made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of sandwich typically found in Louisiana.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever tried a traditional Louisiana poboy?
meanings.sent2: In New Orleans, you can find the best poboys in town.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the poboy must have a secret ingredient - Louisiana magic.
meanings.sent4: The poboy was a taste of the bayou in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The poboy was as authentic as a Louisiana sunset.
